fields.description:
The background of the window gets transparent when an animated object on the window starts.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Compile the attached test
2. Click on Acceptance tab and run TIMOB-7517
3. Click on the red box

Actual: After the animation is complete the background goes transparent
Expected: Background should not go transparent
fields.summary: Android: Animation: V8/Rhino: The window background gets transparent when animated object is set up
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK: 2.0.0.v20120326164801
Titanium Studio: 2.0.0.201203262445
Java Runtime: V8, Rhino
Android Device: Nexus One (V2.2.2)
